title: Toasting UK royals with a 'Markle Sparkle?' It's an American thing
text:
Toasting UK royals with a 'Markle Sparkle?' It's an American thing 11:16am EDT - 01:30
Looking to give Americans a taste of something they rejected more than 240 years ago, a Washington bar is going with a theme in honor of the wedding. Saskia O'Donoghue reports
